title: [Neuroscience] Researchers demonstrated that the brains of people playing an online game together were synchronised without physical presence. This synchronization has been linked with empathy and cooperation in face-to-face situations. However, its role in online, remote interaction has remained unknown

[Health] Research reveals potentially life-changing impact of internet forums on those in remission from opioid use disorder. Researchers used the discussion site Reddit as the basis for the research and began by focusing upon one of its dedicated forums – or subreddits – called ‘OpiatesRecovery’.
